question: What is the estimated GDP growth rate of India in FY 21, according to the latest Economic Survey 2019-20?
explanation:
The recent Economic Survey 2019-20 was presented by the Chief Economic Adviser Krishnamurthy Subramanian and tabled in Parliament by the Union Finance minister, Nirmala Sitharaman, a day before the presentation of Union Budget 2020-21.
As per the document, the economic growth of the next fiscal year is projected to be 6-6.5 percent. The GDP of the previous fiscal year FY20 was stated as 5 per cent. It also hoped for an upward growth in the second half of 2019-20, after the economy slowed down to 4.8% GDP growth in H1 of 2019-20.
